```{r setup}
library(knitr)
library(swfscAirDAS)
```


See below for the AirDAS data format required by this package. In addition, you can use `airdas_format_copy` to save the pdf describing the format requirements to a location of your choice:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Code not run
airdas_format_copy("your_filepath_here.pdf")
```
